items.sentence: I\'d be surprised if you were able to do that.
Tom told me that he didn\'t want to tell Mary.
My father suggested that we should go camping.
I\'ll never tell anyone what you just told me.
Doesn\'t Tom stay with you when he\'s in town?
Tom said that he was hoping you would do that.
Tom is hoping to visit Boston the next winter.
Tom is in the kitchen, making a pot of coffee.
This river is the second longest in Australia.
Those trees are blocking our view of the lake.
